S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-1046 JVMInfo is duplicated in derbyclient.jar DERBY-5431 If 10.7 or greater derbyclient.jar is in the classpath before an older release's server jars, derby fails to boot with NoSuchFieldError for JVMInfo.JAVA_SQL_TYPES_BOOLEAN
Remove references to JVMInfo in xaHelper and sysinfo to get it out of derbytools.jar and derbyclient.jar
